job_title: Technical Architect – (Sr. Java developer willing to work as Architect)
jd: From: Abhishek Pathak, Stellar Consulting Solutions abhishek.pathak@stellarconsulting.com Reply to: abhishek.pathak@stellarconsulting.com Job Title: Technical Architect – (Sr. Java developer willing to work as Architect)Location: Duluth, GA (Hybrid-3days/week) Length of Assignment: 8 months w/ possible extensionsExp.: 10+ yearsRate: $70/hr. on C2CJob Summary:1. Architecture Design:o Develop and implement enterprise architecture solutions using TOGAF framework.o Design and implement microservices architecture for scalable and resilient applications.o Lead the design and development of web applications using Spring Boot, Java 8, Java 11,MongoDB, React JS/Vue JS (preferred).2. Cloud Solutions:o Architect and design cloud solutions using Google Cloud Platform (GCP) to ensure scalability, reliability, and performance.o Develop cloud-native applications and migrate existing applications to the cloud.3. Solution Architecture:o Define and maintain the overall solution architecture for various projects, ensuring alignment with business objectives and technology standards.o Provide technical leadership and guidance to development teams on best practices, standards, and frameworks.4. Integration:o Integrate various systems and applications, including Dynamics AX, to streamline business processes and improve efficiency.o Ensure seamless data flow and interoperability between different systems.5. Technology Evaluation:o Stay updated with emerging technologies and industry trends to continuously improve the technology stack.o Evaluate and recommend new tools, frameworks, and technologies that can enhance the development process and product quality.6. Collaboration:o Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, product managers, and business stakeholders, to gather requirements and define technical solutions.o Act as a liaison between technical teams and business units to ensure successful project deliveryExperience:• 8-10 yrs total experiencemRequired Skills:o 1. Strong background in Java (Java 8 and Java 11), Spring Boot and MongoDBo 2. Experience with cloud architecture and design, specifically with Google Cloud Platform (GCP).o 3. Excellent problem-solving, analytical interpersonal and communication skills.
